markdown:
Ssumzilis are lanky, murderous fey who delight in the thrill of the hunt. They are particularly skilled/adept at stalking their prey in the rain and most commonly reside in rainforests and coastal regions, where frequent rain provides ample opportunity to hunt. Camouflaged by their cloud-gray skin, ssumzilis often compete in tests of stealth when hunting in groups, taking particular delight in approaching their quarry as closely as possible without being observed. **[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Ssumzili](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1660) **Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 85 **Perception** +25; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +25, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21 **Str** +5 **Dex** +7 **Con** +4 **Int** +3 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +3 **Deluge Vision** A ssumzili ignores sensory difficulties caused by rain.
**Precipitation Camouflage** A ssumzili can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) in rainfall, even if it doesn't have cover. --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +20 **Ref** +25 **Will** +23 **HP** 201 **Resistances** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10 **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 10 **Standing Water** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) 10 feet. When it rains, the ground near a ssumzili becomes slick. When raining, all terrain within 10 feet of a ssumzili is slippery, with the effects of [_grease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=140) (DC 29). Ssumzilis are immune to this effect. --- **Speed** 40 feet; puddle stride **Melee** claw +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 3d8+7 slashing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 29 - **1st** [Negate Aroma](/Spells.aspx?ID=206) - **2nd** [Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215), [Quench](/Spells.aspx?ID=709) (at will), [Water Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) - **3rd** [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94) - **4th** [Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=155) - **5th** [Transmute Rock and Mud](/Spells.aspx?ID=724) (rock to mud only) - **Constant (2nd)** [Endure Elements](/Spells.aspx?ID=99) (cold) **Puddle Stride** A ssumzili ignores difficult terrain caused by rain, such as puddles or wet rocks. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** A ssumzili deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Soaking Strike** The ssumzili makes a melee Strike. If the Strike damages the target, the target must also attempt a DC 32 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature becomes soaked, causing them to treat the [environmental temperature](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) as one step colder (mild to severe, severe to extreme, and so on) until they dry off.
**Failure** As success, and the creature is [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) for 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** As failure but the fatigue lasts until the target gets a full night's rest.
Hunting Patterns of Ssumzilis Being ambush hunters, ssumzilis tend to avoid hunting without the cover of rainfall whenever possible. A ssumzili encountered hunting on a sunny day is doing so out of desperation and is likely to be unpredictable and erratic as a result.
name: Ssumzili

Camouflaged by their cloud-gray skin, ssumzilis often compete in tests of stealth when hunting in groups, taking particular delight in approaching their quarry as closely as possible without being observed.
